scenario: UnionPay, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, Discover and Diners Club credit, debit and prepaid card transactions are projected to reach 1.109 trillion worldwide in 2029, a 43% increase from 776 billion transactions in 2024. Asia-Pacific is the top region for purchases, led by UnionPay, with projected transactions of 520.14 billion in 2029, accounting for 47% of the worldwide total. Europe will be the second largest region, followed by the United States, Latin America, Middle East & Africa and Canada.
